channel.title: Sega Master System on Losinggeneration Coding Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sega Master System on Losinggeneration Coding Blog

item.title: Game Gear Coding
item.description: About a year or so back I got a book that the public library was giving away after a book sale on Z80 assembly. I read it, but never really did anything with that knowledge. The thought was always in the back of my head to eventually apply that and play around with some SEGA Master System/Game Gear coding. Unfortunately time has a way of getting away from you. The library had a book sale about a month or so back and they had quite a few books.
